thread.section_title: Alane Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Small and delightful
thread.title_full: Small and delightful - Review of Alane Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: JaneWBR
title: Small and delightful
text:
We stayed here for 3 nights. We were welcomed and made to feel at home by Coralina who answered all our questions. Our room, on the 6th floor was clean and just right - a view of the Sacre Coeur was an extra bonus.
We were a stone's throw from the Gare du Nord and could easily reach other parts of Paris, by metro or on foot. I was a little anxious about the area, but we had no problems.
We highly recommend the Alane Hotel.
Room Tip: Make sure you the waitress knows the type of tea you would like for breakfast! See more room tips
